EmailTemplate.description: Repair Quote Reminder Nine Days Mail
EmailTemplate.name: Repair Quote Reminder Nine Days Mail
EmailTemplate.subject: Repair Quote Reminder Nine Days
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Honeywell Customer Support Representative,
{!Case.CaseNumber} Order {!Case.Sales_Order_Number__c} has reached 9 days on hold from the initial quote/request being sent. This is an automatic notification to indicate that an action on your part is required.
Please refer back to the following documents for proper Customer follow up process: - AG-5418 - RO-StdWork-1003- RO Z146 - RO-StdWork-2001- RO Z136 - RO-StdWork-4002- RO RAI - RO-StdWork-4003- Z144
If you have questions please contact your supervisor.
Thank you!
